post.author: Admin
post.title: Extra Fruit Available for Purchase
post.description: The North Royalton Band has a limited quantity of fresh picked Florida fruit from their recent holid
post.content:
The North Royalton Band has a limited quantity of fresh picked Florida fruit from their recent holiday sale. Items include:

  1. 10lb bags of oranges, grapefruits, tangelos or mixed oranges & grapefruit for $15
  2. 20lb cartons of grapefruits for $25
  3. 20lb gift boxes of oranges, grapefruits & tangelos or oranges, grapefruits & apples for $30

All fruit is on a first come first serve basis. This fruit was fresh picked last week and is spectacular. To place an order please email your name, phone number, address, and order to northroyaltonbandboosters@gmail.com and arrangements can be made for pick up at the football annex location or delivery to your home.

As always, thank you for your support of band programs at North Royalton.
